before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"a77s6","text":"Sterilise all the equipment that is not single use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28thm","text":"Ensure that the sample are as dry as possible before starting the protocol, taking particular care of removing any buffer they may have been kept in (Especially if RNALater was used)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"78kqd","text":"DNeasy PowerSoil Pro Kit modified extraction protocol to improve yield with inhibitor heavy hard corals. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u8d1","text":"Tested and developed on Acropora corals. Optimised for all coral DNA extraction that with high quantity of inhibitors","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8qh9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s4af","text":"(Step 1 to 8 modified protocol; step 9 to 18 manufacturer’s protocol.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3j0fn","text":"Gently crush a small piece of coral in a mortar and pestle (~ , in order not to overload the column though). And transfer in a PowerBead Pro Tube (or 2 ml Microcentrifuge).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ol03","text":"Note: For improved yield focus on adding more tissue and less carbonate from the skeleton, a scalpel ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"29F31F30EEC111EB990383B04435AD84","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8onkn","text":"Discard the flow-through and repeat step 9 to ensure that all the lysate has passed through the MB Spin Column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9399l","text":"Carefully place the MB Spin Column into a clean 2 ml Collection Tube. {"blocks":[{"key":"3oeh0","text":"Incubate at 56 degrees for 60 minutes. Vortex for   every   (Ideally, do this on a shaking heat block, with shaking on full)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6dk3m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gij3","text":"Note: If on orbital incubator at a minimum of 300rpm or more, can skip the vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fr28","text":"Add an extra hour of incubation to increase yield. More than   will results in shearing of the longer DNA fragments","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d34kr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"9F205580EEC011EB990383B04435AD84","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"A1FBB010EEC011EB990383B04435AD84","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"A88A4EA0EEC011EB990383B04435AD84","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
